Reviews.Title: Excellent Laptop flawed by minor issues.
Reviews.Author: Jesse Brooks
Reviews.Content: Pros:Performance is excellent, with no issues or hiccups trying to do intensive tasks.Sound quality from the JBL speaker system is amazing for a laptop.The Anti-glare display, even though it is a lower resolution, provides a crisp and bright image.The keyboard is very well made, with surrounding keys not moving when a key near is pushed.The touchpad is nicely made, with physical buttons for the mouse clicks.Cons:Build quality could be better/ It has a slight flex in the chassis at times.Battery life could be better, although it should not be a top priority for a laptop of this performance.Screen hinges bounce slightly, however they do not give any indication of loosening.Overall, this laptop is the best one I've ever owned. I love it! I would recommend this to anybody looking in the market for a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Good Great
Reviews.Author: Joseph Morana
Reviews.Content: A Great buy. Runs very fast and good. a great and good buy. Would get it again. A must try.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made.
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: I returned this laptop due to poor quality in manufacturing (cheaply made) and poor performance with Windows 8. The listing said it had 8GB RAM, it only had 6GB. The laptop came with the most basic, bare-bones version of Windows 8. Microsoft support could not even get the laptop to accept my anti-virus software (McAfee). It came with no user instructions, no warranty info, or recovery disks.
